NOTE:  'The Town' come in 2 versions on the BD. The Theatrical Cut and 
       the Extended Cut. Nothing unusual there, but what is rather unusual is that
       WB chose to include 2 encodes of each version instead of the more commonly
       used Seamless Branching. So the bitrate is quite low. The Video bitrate   
       for the Extended version is 13949 kbps (The Theatrical Cut is even lower) 
       and that's below my usual steady bitrate of 14000 kbps, so I've turned the 
       bitrate down to 10000 kbps on this release.

       That said then the encoders at Warner Brothers did an amazing job encoding
       this transfer, because with the low bitrates in mind, the image quaity is
       surprisingly good..
